name: Before The Sandstorm (Grumpy Weasel)
description:
Get your guns! Hoyt is a man who doesn't like to be fooled. Make your way around Silverado and show Dawson's gang who is boss.

Shoot your enemies, sneak behind them, lure them out of their hiding spot and much more. 

Make your own way trough stages, there is no pre-determined path, eliminate them all as you wish!
